title: Queen of Lies
description: Book 2 in the Empire of Lies trilogy. The twists and turns in Michael & Meredith's story continue...The woman I fell in love with is a walking contradiction...She's sexy as hell, yet infuriating. Hopelessly in love with me, but carefully plotting to get the hell away.She honestly thinks that I'm the 'king of lies'?Well, she f-cking fooled you...She's the queen.
author: Whitney G.
